page.title: 11Hartlepool Public Transport
page.content: Hartlepool has thirty licenced taxis and thirty three licenced private hire vehicles operating within the town. A taxi licence is Â£30 per year and a private hire licence is Â£30 per year. There are eight taxi operators in Hartlepool, the main ones being Camerons and Streamline. Camerons taxis are mainly four year old Ford Cortinas which have been converted to run on either Liquid Propaine Gas or petrol. Streamline taxis are new Vauxhall Cavaliers with diesel engines. All taxis must display a large Hartlepool licence disc on the side of the vehicle. They also usually advertise their company name on a light up display panel attached to the roof of the vehicle.
